{{DISPLAYTITLE:AFX_Heartbeat}}This is one of the [[sound sequence]]s used for ''[[Heretic]]'''s [[ambient sound]]s. Although it is played from {{Class|HereticSoundSequence5}}, it can also be used independently.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Heartbeat environment 4 slot [[HereticAmbience]]
playtime world/amb5 35 playtime world/amb5 35 playtime world/amb5 35 playuntildone world/amb5 end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
